We design and build fences that fit your property, lifestyle, and budget — backed by our exclusive Fence Genius technology for perfect planning.

Fence Post Options

Choose the right post for your fence. We typically recommend 4.125" x 4.125" x 9' posts for most projects; upgrade options increase strength and longevity.

3.5" x 3.5" Fence Posts
Not recommended

Smaller “4x4” posts with shorter lifespan; more prone to warp and rot over time.

Learn Why We Don't Use These

4.125" x 4.125" x 9' Posts
Recommended

Our most common and recommended post size—great balance of strength, cost, and longevity.

Learn More

5.5" x 5.5" x 10' (6x6)
Longest lasting

Premium, heavy-duty posts providing maximum rigidity and the best long-term performance.

Learn More About 6x6 Posts

4x4 Steel Posts
40-Year Warranty

Barrier Boss black steel posts—won't rot like wood. Available in 9' and 12' heights for lattice toppers.

Learn More About Steel Posts

Post on Pipe
Steel core

A steel fence post inserted into a 4.125" x 4.125" x 7' wood post to resist ground-rot factors.

Learn More About Post on Pipe

Cedar Post on Pipe
Premium Cedar

Cedar post on steel pipe with through-bolt for enhanced wind resistance. Maintains consistent cedar aesthetic.

Learn More About Cedar Post on Pipe

Optional Fence Upgrades

Optional upgrades that enhance durability, privacy, and finish.

Upgrade to 4" Screws

Use 4" exterior screws for 2x4 rails instead of nails for superior hold and longevity.

Learn More About Exterior Screws

Clear Cedar Fence Boards Upgrade

Premium clear cedar boards with minimal knots for a refined appearance.

Learn More About Clear Cedar

Board on Board Style

Overlapping fence boards eliminate gaps for complete privacy.

Learn More About Board on Board

2x4 Rot Board

Bottom 2x4 sacrificial board for near-zero ground clearance without exposing cedar to soil.

Learn More About Rot Boards

2 Foot Lattice Topper

Add a 2-foot lattice extension to achieve near 8-foot total fence height for maximum privacy while maintaining the elegant lattice aesthetic at the top.

Learn More About Lattice Toppers

Pre-Staining

Cedar components are stained prior to install for consistent coverage and early protection.

Learn More About Pre-Staining

Soil Haul-Away

We remove excess soil generated during post hole digging.

Learn More About Soil Haul-Away

Trellis Systems

Add trellis features to elevate curb appeal and support plants.

Learn More About Trellis Systems
